subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Patrice Bergeron scored the go-ahead goal with just over six minutes left to give the Boston Bruins a 2-1 win Monday night and a 2-1 lead over the visiting Buffalo Sabres in their Eastern Conference playoff series.
snippet: Patrice Bergeron scored the go-ahead goal with just over six minutes left to give the Boston Bruins a 2-1 win Monday night and a 2-1 lead over the visiting Buffalo Sabres in their Eastern Conference playoff series.
